nodes.bodyText:
Isn't this method the same as in:
https://github.com/SonarSource/sonar-java/pull/2819/files#diff-ad75e35ac7cb0aad007e6d9e495bbae8R127
Maybe you can make it static and public, outside of the inner class, to be reused from the outsilde-
javadoc is missing for this part. If it's required to call it at some point, then document why.
Could you take the opportunity to move the test file into the new module?
